Get Started

Welcome to the EdCast Integrations Portal !

EdCast integrations allow you to integrate User as well as Content data from various systems to the EdCast LXP platform.

This section includes the following topics:
Integrations     Get started on integrating HRMS and LMS systems with EdCast LXP platform
SSO     Get started on integrating external indetity providers with EdCast LXP platform
LRS with xAPI     Get started on using xAPI's to record learning activities in EdCast
Developer API (v5)     Get started on EdCast Developer API to integrate User as well as Content data with LXP platform
ECL Developer API     Get started on EdCast ECL Developer API to integrate Content data with LXP platform
